String.name: LOGGER_TEST
String.description: The logger will print the values of this variable when it is set.

Int32.name: LOGGER_TEST_INTEGER
Int32.description: This is only used to test logger replace function #i0#

Boolean.name: LOGGER_TEST_BOOLEAN
Boolean.description: This is only used to test logger replace function #b0#

Float64.name: LOGGER_TEST_DERIVATIVE
Float64.description: This is to test that the derivative attribute may appear on any Float64 variables.

Float64.name: LOGGER_TEST_DERIVATIVE_DER
Float64.description: This is to test that the derivative attribute may appear on any Float64 variables.

Float64.name: array_of_states
Float64.description: Variable testing of arrays. Outputs states and state derivatives: {{h, h'}, {v, v'}} (where h' = v)
